section.p: If you no longer need a , for example, if you have specified incorrect parameters or it has been filled with the wrong data, you can delete it.
For learning how to delete a shared Translation Memory, see .

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The to be deleted
Delete from the File menu
Before deletes the requested , a message window is displayed asking you to confirm that you want to delete the .

ul.li: If you select No, the is not deleted.
If you select Yes, the is deleted.

section.title: Results
section.p: If you select Yes, the is deleted, and the disk space is freed. Otherwise, the remains unchanged. References to this may still exist in certain folders. Update the folder properties so that the deleted is no longer referenced.
